itemDisplayName: Red Hat - JBoss EAP 7.2 on RHEL 7.7 VM (single-VM)
description: This template allows you to create a RHEL 7.7 VM running JBoss EAP 7.2 and also deploy a web application called eap-session-replication, you can login into the admin console using the JBoss EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application called eap-session-replication on JBoss EAP 7.2 running on RHEL 7.7 VM
